fields.text: Is it possible to initiate a DOM event from javascript? For example, to simulate a mouse click on an element so that the javascript code will click on the user.
fields.answers: {"answers":[{"answer":"Yes you can","result":"True"},{"answer":"No you can not","result":"False"},{"answer":"In some browsers you can","result":"False"}]}
